title: PRS ‘Biki’ Oberoi (1929-2023): The man who scaled the heights of excellence in hospitality industry
description: PRS Oberoi, who died on Tuesday, ensured that the hotel group named after his family set impeccable standards in luxury and attention to detail. He was also a people person.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
